constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 35 (Wednesday, February 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CLYBURN:
H.R. 1288.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H617]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: To amend the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Act to extend the authorization of the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor Commission, and for other purposes.
